XMLStartup - Class in de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.io
This class makes use of the SAX2 parser to deserialize startup XML file and uses JDOM to serialize updates on any XML file used by the application.
XMLStartup() - Constructor for class de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.io.XMLStartup
sole default constructor
XMLStartupHandler - Class in de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.io
The job of this class is to extend the default handler for SAX events and is an customized event handler class.
XMLStartupHandler() - Constructor for class de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.io.XMLStartupHandler
sole default constructor only visible to package
XMLStartupTag - Interface in de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.io
Summarizes XML tag elements of startup XML file.
XMLTestDataCollection - Class in de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.io
This class has the job of saving the generated test data collection as a physical XML file to the file system.
XMLTestDataCollection() - Constructor for class de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.io.XMLTestDataCollection
sole default constrcutor
XMLUpdater - Class in de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.worker
To reflect the user interactions with the system data structure and its serialized data we update that synchronized.
XMLUpdater(URI, URI, XMLStartup, boolean, String, Object) - Constructor for class de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.worker.XMLUpdater
runs an update on the XML startup file to reflect the user actions.
